name: Deluxe Mountain View
shortDescription: Panoramic mountain views with luxury amenities
description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Murree's mountain ranges from your private sanctuary. This elegantly appointed room features floor-to-ceiling windows, premium furnishings, and modern amenities for the discerning traveler.

name: Executive Suite
shortDescription: Spacious suite with separate living area
description: Our Executive Suite offers the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. With a separate living area, premium amenities, and stunning valley views, it's ideal for extended stays or special occasions.

name: Premium Villa
description: The pinnacle of luxury accommodation. Our Premium Villa features a private garden, dedicated butler service, and unparalleled privacy amidst the serene mountain landscape.

name: Family Retreat
shortDescription: Perfect for families with connecting rooms
description: Designed with families in mind, this spacious accommodation features connecting rooms, child-safe amenities, and easy access to family-friendly facilities.
